TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SessionStateSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class SessionStateSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置 Web 应用程序的会话状态。

span.span: Configures the session state for a Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是指由标识的 Machine.config 或 Web.config 配置文件中的元素`sessionState`标记。The class refers to the element in the Machine.config or Web.config configuration file identified by the `sessionState` tag. 当新的客户端开始与 Web 应用程序进行交互时，会话 ID 进行颁发，并在该会话是有效的时间与来自同一客户端的所有后续请求关联。When a new client begins interacting with a Web application, a session ID is issued and associated with all the subsequent requests from the same client during the time that the session is valid. 此 ID 用于维护与客户端会话关联的请求之间的服务器端状态。This ID is used to maintain server-side state associated with the client session across requests. 控制 ASP.NET 应用程序如何建立和维护每个客户端代表此关联。The controls how the ASP.NET application establishes and maintains this association on behalf of each client. 此机制是非常灵活，使你能够主机进程外，也可不使用 cookie，除了别的跟踪状态的会话状态信息。This mechanism is very flexible and gives you the ability to host session-state information out of process and to track state without using cookies, among other things. ## Examples 本部分提供两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何指定以声明方式中的多个属性的值`sessionState`部分中，还可作为的成员访问类。The first demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `sessionState` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 第二个演示如何使用类。The second demonstrates how to use the class. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为指定值`sessionState`部分。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `sessionState` section. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/CS/sessionstatesection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/VB/sessionstatesection.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether compression is enabled for session-state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当值设置为`true`，ASP.NET 使用类来压缩和展开会话状态数据。When the value is set to `true`, ASP.NET uses the class to compress and expand session-state data.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::HttpCookieMode Cookieless { System::Web::HttpCookieMode get(); void set(System::Web::HttpCookieMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使用 Cookie 标识客户端会话。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cookies are used to identify client sessions.

value.span: 如果所有请求都被视为无 Cookie，则为 ；如果没有任何请求被视为无 Cookie，则为 ；或者为 值之一。

span.span: if all requests are treated as cookieless, or if no requests are treated as cookieless, or one of the values.

value.span: 在 ASP.NET 2.0 版中，默认值为 。

span.span: The default value in ASP.NET version 2.0 is .

value.span: 在早期版本中，默认值为 。

span.span: In earlier versions, the default value was .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话状态可以存储将客户端与服务器会话相关联的唯一 ID 的两种方式： 通过将 HTTP cookie 存储客户端上或通过编码在 URL 中的会话 ID。There are two ways that session state can store the unique ID that associates the client with a server session: by storing an HTTP cookie on the client or by encoding the session ID in the URL. 在 cookie 中存储的会话 ID 更加安全，但要求客户端的浏览器支持 cookie。Storing the session ID in the cookie is more secure but requires the client browser to support cookies. 对于应用程序允许不支持 cookie，如使用不同的移动设备的客户端可能在 URL 中存储的会话 ID。For applications that allow clients that do not support cookies, such as a variety of mobile devices, the session ID may be stored in the URL. URL 选项有几个缺点。The URL option has several drawbacks. 它要求在站点上的链接都是相对并且页进行重定向会话使用新的查询字符串值，开头并且公开中查询字符串，其中它可能会拾取在安全攻击中使用的会话 ID 权限。It requires that the links on the site be relative and that the page be redirected at the beginning of the session with new query-string values, and it exposes the session ID right in the query string, where it can be picked up for use in a security attack. 建议用于无 cookie 模式下，只有在需要支持缺少 cookie 支持的客户端的。You are encouraged to use the cookieless mode only if you need to support clients that lack cookie support. 会话状态还支持两个附加选项：和。Session state also supports two additional options: and . 前者启用会话状态模块，以确定哪种模式 (cookie 或无 cookie) 在基于浏览器功能的每个客户端基础上使用。The former enables the session-state module to determine what mode (cookie or cookieless) is used on a per-client basis based on the browser capabilities. 选项执行使用浏览器以验证是否 cookie 可能存储，并因此需要附加请求以供判断的握手。The option performs a handshake with the browser to verify whether a cookie may be stored, and therefore requires an additional request to make the determination. 如果你需要支持无 cookie 的客户端，务必考虑使用仅的需要它们的客户端生成无 cookie 的 Url。If you need to support cookieless clients, strongly consider using to generate cookieless URLs only for clients that require them. > [!NOTE] > 与最高。浏览器 4.1 或向上。浏览器 3.2，行为总是像的值属性对象是`false`，除非中的属性Web.config 节已显式设置为`true`.With UP.Browser 4.1 or UP.Browser 3.2, always behaves as if the value of the property of the object is `false`, unless the property in the section of Web.config has been explicitly set to `true`. > > 在 ASP.NET 1.1 版中，此设置的选项已`true`或`false`，但使用 ASP.NET 2.0 中，选择已展开，和现在是默认设置。In ASP.NET version 1.1, the options for this setting were `true` or `false`, but with ASP.NET 2.0, the choices are expanded, and is now the default setting. 如果 Web 应用程序的属性设置为布尔值，则应该按以下浏览器的预期方式工作。If your Web application has the property set to a Boolean value, then should work as expected for these browsers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取属性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 中的代码示例是指类主题，若要了解如何访问对象。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定存储会话状态的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying where to store the session state.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是必需的特性，可以从配置层次结构中较高级别的或默认值被继承。The is not a required attribute and can be inherited from a higher level in the configuration hierarchy or from the default value. 但是，此部分配置处理程序将始终写出时编写本部分基于当前继承的值的模式。However, the configuration handler for this section will always write out the mode based on the current inherited value when writing this section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取属性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 中的代码示例是指类主题，若要了解如何访问对象。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/CS/sessionstatesection.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/VB/sessionstatesection.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PartitionResolverType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定存储会话状态的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying where to store the session state.

value.span: 指定存储会话状态的位置的值，或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: A value specifying where to store the session state, or an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定属性，则属性和属性将被忽略。If the property is specified, the property and property are ignored. 可以通过锁定属性中的其他属性类似[sessionState 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)元素。The can be locked via the property like other properties within the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) element. 返回的连接字符串将用于在每次请求连接到请求的其余部分的相应的服务器位置。The connection string returned by the will be used on every request to connect to the appropriate server location for the remainder of the request. 如果连接字符串无效，ASP.NET 将引发相同的服务器配置的连接字符串无效时引发的异常。If the connection string is invalid, ASP.NET will throw the same exception that is thrown when the configured connection string to the server is invalid. 此属性用于跨多个后端节点的会话状态数据分区时在 SQL 或状态服务器模式。This property is used to partition session-state data across multiple backend nodes when in SQL or state-server mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 替代会话 ID 生成和管理自定义会话 ID 管理方案。The overrides session ID generation and management for custom session ID management schemes. 默认值为空字符串 ("")。The default value is an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan SqlCommandTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置使用 SQL Server 会话状态模式的 SQL 命令的超时时间。

value.span: 时间，以秒为单位，此后的 SQL 命令将超时时间量。默认值为 30 秒。

span.span: The amount of time, in seconds, after which a SQL command will time out. The default is 30 seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan SqlConnectionRetryInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 ASP.NET 重新连接到数据库之前应经过的时间间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the time interval that should elapse before ASP.NET reconnects to the database.

value.span: ASP.NET 重新连接到数据库之前应经过的时间间隔。

span.span: The time interval that should elapse before ASP.NET reconnects to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以秒为单位之前发生连接错误时重新连接到数据库中指定的时间间隔。The specifies the time interval in seconds before reconnecting to the database when a connection error has occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SqlConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 SQL 连接字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL connection string.

value.span: SQL 连接字符串。

span.span: The SQL connection string.

value.span: 其默认值为泛型字符串："data source=127.0.0.1;Integrated Security=SSPI"

span.span: Its default value is the generic string: "data source=127.0.0.1;Integrated Security=SSPI"

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`sqlConnectionString`时，属性是必需设置为。This `sqlConnectionString` attribute is required when is set to . > [!NOTE] > 若要使用会话状态模式，你必须运行 InstallSqlState.sql SQL 脚本 (在安装的哪些 [*驱动器*:] \WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*VersionNumber*作为默认.NET Framework 安装的一部分） 的计算机上运行 SQL Server 将存储会话状态。To use the session state mode, you must run the InstallSqlState.sql SQL script (which is installed in [*drive*:]\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*VersionNumber* as part of the default .NET Framework installation) on the computer running SQL Server that will store the session state. 这将创建一个新的存储过程名 ASPState 数据库并在 TempDB 数据库中创建新的 ASPStateTempApplications 和 ASPStateTempSessions 表。This creates a database called ASPState with new stored procedures and creates new ASPStateTempApplications and ASPStateTempSessions tables in the TempDB database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取属性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 中的代码示例是指类主题，若要了解如何访问对象。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/CS/sessionstatesection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/VB/sessionstatesection.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ StateConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置状态服务器连接字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the state server connection string.

value.span: 状态服务器连接字符串。

span.span: The state server connection string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当远程存储会话状态时，此属性指定服务器名称和端口。This property specifies the server name and the port when the session state is stored remotely. `stateConnectionString`时，属性是必需设置为。The `stateConnectionString` attribute is required when the is set to . > [!NOTE] > 请确保在存储会话状态信息的远程服务器上运行 ASP.NET 状态服务。Make sure the ASP.NET state service is running on the remote server that stores the session-state information. 此服务已安装与 ASP.NET 搭配使用，并且默认情况下，在位于 [*驱动器*:] \WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*VersionNumber*\aspnet_state.exe。This service is installed with ASP.NET and is located by default at [*drive*:]\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*VersionNumber*\aspnet_state.exe. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取属性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 中的代码示例是指类主题，若要了解如何访问对象。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/CS/sessionstatesection.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SessionStateSection/VB/sessionstatesection.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan StateNetworkTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 服务器和状态服务器间的网络连接可保持空闲的时间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time the network connection between the Web server and the state server can remain idle.

value.span: 放弃会话前 Web 服务器和状态服务器间的网络连接可保持空闲的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time, in seconds, that the network connection between the Web server and the state server can remain idle before the session is abandoned.

value.span: 默认值为 10 秒。

span.span: The default value is 10 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`sessionStateSection`时，属性是必需属性设置为。This `sessionStateSection` attribute is required when the property is set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取属性。The following code example demonstrates how to get the property. 中的代码示例是指类主题，若要了解如何访问对象。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to access the object.
